segment.source: Sign up for Windows Store for Business (Windows 10)
segment.target: Sign up for Windows Store for Business (Windows 10)

segment.source: Before you sign up for Windows Store for Business, at a minimum, you'll need an Azure Active Directory (AD) account for your organization, and you'll need to be the global administrator for your organization.
segment.target: Before you sign up for Windows Store for Business, at a minimum, you'll need an Azure Active Directory (AD) account for your organization, and you'll need to be the global administrator for your organization.

segment.source: Sign up for Windows Store for Business
segment.target: Sign up for Windows Store for Business

segment.source: Applies to
segment.target: Applies to

segment.source: Windows 10
segment.target: Windows 10

segment.source: Windows 10 Mobile
segment.target: Windows 10 Mobile

segment.source: Before you sign up for Windows Store for Business, at a minimum, you'll need an Azure Active Directory (AD) account for your organization, and you'll need to be the global administrator for your organization.
segment.target: Before you sign up for Windows Store for Business, at a minimum, you'll need an Azure Active Directory (AD) account for your organization, and you'll need to be the global administrator for your organization.

segment.source: If your organization is already using Azure AD, you can go ahead and sign up for Store for Business.
segment.target: If your organization is already using Azure AD, you can go ahead and sign up for Store for Business.

segment.source: If not, we'll help you create an Azure AD account and directory as part of the sign up process.
segment.target: If not, we'll help you create an Azure AD account and directory as part of the sign up process.

segment.source: Sign up for Store for Business
segment.target: Sign up for Store for Business

segment.source: Before signing up for the Store for Business, make sure you're the global administrator for your organization.
segment.target: Before signing up for the Store for Business, make sure you're the global administrator for your organization.

segment.source: To sign up for the Store for Business
segment.target: To sign up for the Store for Business

segment.source: Go to https://www.microsoft.com/business-store, and click Sign up.
segment.target: Go to https://www.microsoft.com/business-store, and click Sign up.

segment.source: If you start the Store for Business sign up process, and don't have an Azure AD directory for your organization, we'll help you create one.
segment.target: If you start the Store for Business sign up process, and don't have an Azure AD directory for your organization, we'll help you create one.

segment.source: For more info, see Sign up for Azure AD accounts.
segment.target: For more info, see Sign up for Azure AD accounts.

segment.source: If you already have an Azure AD directory, you'll sign in to Store for Business, and then accept Store for Business terms.
segment.target: If you already have an Azure AD directory, you'll sign in to Store for Business, and then accept Store for Business terms.

segment.source: To sign up for Azure AD accounts through Office 365 for Business
segment.target: To sign up for Azure AD accounts through Office 365 for Business

segment.source: Signing up for Store for Business will create an Azure AD directory and global administrator account for you.
segment.target: Signing up for Store for Business will create an Azure AD directory and global administrator account for you.

segment.source: There are just a few steps.
segment.target: There are just a few steps.

segment.source: Step 1: About you.
segment.target: Step 1: About you.

segment.source: Type the required info and click Next.
segment.target: Type the required info and click Next.

segment.source: Step 2: Create an ID.
segment.target: Step 2: Create an ID.

segment.source: We'll use info you provided on the previous page to build your user ID.
segment.target: We'll use info you provided on the previous page to build your user ID.

segment.source: Check the info and click Next.
segment.target: Check the info and click Next.

segment.source: Step 3: You're in.
segment.target: Step 3: You're in.

segment.source: Let us know how you'd like to receive a verification code, and click either Text me, or Call me.
segment.target: Let us know how you'd like to receive a verification code, and click either Text me, or Call me.

segment.source: We'll send you a verification code
segment.target: We'll send you a verification code

segment.source: Verification.
segment.target: Verification.

segment.source: Type your verification code and click Create my account.
segment.target: Type your verification code and click Create my account.

segment.source: Save this info.
segment.target: Save this info.

segment.source: Be sure to save the portal sign-in page and your user ID info.
segment.target: Be sure to save the portal sign-in page and your user ID info.

segment.source: Click You're ready to go.
segment.target: Click You're ready to go.

segment.source: At this point, you'll have an Azure AD directory created with one user account.
segment.target: At this point, you'll have an Azure AD directory created with one user account.

segment.source: That user account is the global administrator.
segment.target: That user account is the global administrator.

segment.source: You can use that account to sign in to Store for Business.
segment.target: You can use that account to sign in to Store for Business.

segment.source: Sign in with your Azure AD account.
segment.target: Sign in with your Azure AD account.

segment.source: Read through and accept Store for Business terms.
segment.target: Read through and accept Store for Business terms.

segment.source: Welcome to the Store for Business.
segment.target: Welcome to the Store for Business.

segment.source: Click Next to continue.
segment.target: Click Next to continue.

segment.source: Next steps
segment.target: Next steps

segment.source: After signing up for Store for Business, you can:
segment.target: After signing up for Store for Business, you can:

segment.source: Add users to your Azure AD directory.
segment.target: Add users to your Azure AD directory.

segment.source: If you created your Azure AD directory during Store for Business sign up, additional user accounts are required for employees to install apps you assign to them, or to browse the private store.
segment.target: If you created your Azure AD directory during Store for Business sign up, additional user accounts are required for employees to install apps you assign to them, or to browse the private store.

segment.source: For more information, see Manage user accounts in Store for Business.
segment.target: For more information, see Manage user accounts in Store for Business.

segment.source: Assign roles to employees.
segment.target: Assign roles to employees.

segment.source: For more information, see Roles and permissions in the Windows Store for Business.
segment.target: For more information, see Roles and permissions in the Windows Store for Business.
